name: Hamlet (itch)
description:
Explore the charming little hamlet of... Little Whimpering, Orchard Whipstocking, Murmington Green, Shuffling Meadows... tiny glimpses of the inhabitants' lives: their loves, their obsessions with rare earth minerals. And what's the creepy sorcerer up to, hanging around the standing stones all the time? And why is there an eerie thicket of hypnotic lights in the centre of... Whistler's Hill, Chautingly Heath, East Ickington?

This is a little experience, where you peek into unusual villages and catch just a hint of what's going on under the surface. And then you can take a look at the next one, and ask why is that boat stranded so far from the sea?

Hand drawn illustrations, simple interactions, and a surprisingly intricate word-loom which weaves little swatches of delight.
